sense.def:
Z izrazom
nominal
opišemo položaj ali značilnost, ki naj bi jo nekaj imelo, pa je v resnici nima.

seg.quote: We were directing the operation, though under the nominal leadership of a guerrilla general.
Dad, nominally a Methodist, entered churches only for weddings and funerals.

sense.def:
Cena ali vsota, ki je
nominal
, je zelo majhna v primerjavi z resničnimi stroški ali resnično vrednostjo stvari, ki jo kupujemo ali prodajamo.

seg.quote: At a nominal price, the settlers got the rest of the land.
